modName: The Ultimate Shapeshifter Mod by Mortenort
summary: Transform into non playable creatures and play as them....Added Lurker
descriptionHtml:
[b]
[size=4]DO NOT SHARE THE MOD FILE ON OTHER SITES AND UPLOAD IT elsewhere!
[/size]
Project continues thanks to the ones who really supported it!
Thank you!
;)

Next creature : Chaurus Hunter!


[youtube]icQeqRmWCnk[/youtube]
[center]
[size=5]REQUIRES DOWNGUARD AND DRAGONBORN!
DO NOT REPORT BUGS IF YOU DO NOT HAVE THE DLCs!!![/size][/center]
VERSION 1.5 ADDED!
VERY IMPORTANT FIX!

HOW TO FIX THE ANIMATIONS FROM PREVIOUS VERSIONS!!!
IMPORTANT!!!

If you have installed the NON BSA VERSION 1.3 and below,
please delete all mod folders:

meshes/actors/dlc01/vampirebrute
meshes/actors/dlc02/benthiclurker
meshes/actors/dlc02/boarriekling
meshes/actors/dlc02/riekling
meshes/actors/dwarvensteamcenturion

Make sure these does not exist in your meshes folder!
Enjoy! No more weird animations!

Changelog Full:

UPDATE 1.5

FINALLY FIXED BROKEN ANIMATIONS!!!DOWNLOAD ONLY 1.4 AND ABOVE!

Added Lurker and Riekling Raider (on the Polymorph Riekling Spell Options) Shapeshift spells.
Fixed Annoying Slow Walking due to Carryweight being changed on polymorph.
Expanded mod engine.

Read the Book "Mortenort's Spells Book" for additional information.


NEXT CREATURE - ???

..................................................................................

SOME WORDS[/b]:
This is my very first Official Skyrim Mod I develop.
Since I love controlling NPCs and making them playable (Tekken 6 Bosses for PS3 and PSP were my work) I wanted to make a new spell mod for Skyrim
which allows you to transform into a creature.
Now there was such a mod and some other MISC type mods. I saw the Master Shapeshifter Mod by Jarred but I found it needs a lot of improvements.
For example most of the Creature attacks were missing and he has put A HUGE UNNECESSARY scripts collection of more than 12 k files which will surely cause some troubles to your skyrim modding experience while the only necessary scripts are no more than 10.

Anyway.

I wanted to expand his mod, I already made a LIGHTER version of it, but I decided to make my own mod called "Mortenort's Shapeshifter Spells".
For example I wanted the Forgemaster to be playable and I made this mod here which will allow this to happen...

Here I present to you. The Ultimate Shapeshifter Mod for Skyrim.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
RECOMMENDATIONS:

[quote]Still I suggest this mod here to use with the combination of mine until I completely finish mine and make it better:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15045/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D15045%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Master Shapeshifter Mod by Jarred[/url]

MAKE SURE in the load order IT IS BELOW MY Mod otherwise you will not get my mod working correctly.
Example: 1.MasterShapeshifter Mod
             2.Mortenort's Shapeshifter Spells Mod (Currenlty Polymorph Forgemaster)

<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>><<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>
[b]INTRODUCTION[/b]:
This mod allows you to transform currently in the following creatures:

- The Forgemaster (A powerful Dwarven Steam Centurion who is much more stronger and a little bit bigger than the rest of his kind )
-  Gargoyle (All Variations) ( A powerful vampire servant creature who drains HP on attacks and has powerful melee attacks)
-  Riekling and Riekling Raider (All Variants) - A small but powerful creatures.
-  Lurker - We all know what Lurkers are and what they are capable off....:)

I plan to expand it so every creature in the game is playable including those from Dawnguard and Dragonborn.[/quote]

<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<[size=4][b]MORTENORT'S SHAPESHIFTER SPELLS[/b][/size]>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
       --------------------------------------Also Knows AS "[b]THE ULTIMATE SHAPESHIFTER MOD for Skyrim[/b]" --------------------------------------
[quote]"Not long ago there was a powerful archmage who rulled upon everything the eye can see... his power was so great that he was able to transform into everything he wanted. But his corruption latter led to his downfall . Now the one who defeated him found some of his secret books which led to revealing his secret arts of the SHAPESHIFTING....."[/quote][youtube]tzFTpC7fWB0[/youtube]


1. What is this mod.

[quote]As you already saw this is a mod which will allow you to transform into a creature thus making it playable.[/quote]

2. How to install it?
 
[quote]All you do is place the "unmorph.txt" in your Skyrim Main Directory where it's EXE file is and then place the Polymorph Forgemaster.esp and Polymorph Forgemaster.bsa inside your Skyrim/Data Folder.
Then just thick the mod in your Skyrim Launcher.
(If you use other Shapeshifting mods make sure they are below my mod otherwise you will not get it working correctly or not all creature attacks will work)[/quote]

3. Which creatures I can morph to?

[quote]Currently "The Forgemaster", Gargoyle, Riekling, Lurker, More to come soon![/quote]

4 Are there any plans on expanding it?

[quote]Yes. This is my intention. I plan to make more DLC and Vanilla creatures as playable with all their Attacks and Taunts (see I even made the Forgemaster's Scan Taunt to be performable).[/quote]
5. What if I already use the Master Shapeshifter Mod?

[quote]Make sure you have my mod AFTER IT. My mod is with the intention of EXPANDING it . Fixing some things , ADDING new creature ATTACKS , spells etc...
If you have it and you use my mod for example, if you transform into a REGULAR Dwarven Steam Centurion you will see it has a new moves...Actually all his moves are performable and now you can use Frost Dragon Breath as his shout (EG Steam Shout). You can now shout unlike the vanilla Shapeshifter Mod. Same is for the Forgemaster which was never made playable so far as I can see.[/quote]

6. What is the next creature to be playable.

[quote]I wonder... make a suggestion or vote ...[/quote]
------------------------------------------------------------IMPORTANT----------------------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO UNMORPH BACK?

When you are morphed if you installed the mod as the "READ ME.txt" suggests then all you need to do is to bring the console command and then
write[quote] bat unmorph[/quote]In MOST CASES this should work... In case it does not work then just use the eg "player.setrace nord" commad and you will be back.

Sometimes this won't remove some equipped spells/shouts which are not meant for Player character.
Just morph back to the Creature and then immediately write "bat unmorph" in the console. This time it should revert you.
Note This glitch happens on rare occasions.

Report any glitches you have found.

ALWAYS BACKUP YOUR SAVES BEFORE USING!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
LIST OF PLAYABLE CREATURES by this mod:

1. The Forgemaster
2.  Gargoyle (ALL variants)
3.  Riekling (All variants)
4.  Riekling Raider (All variants)
5 . Lurker.
author: Aizer Mortenort
